text.0: swaying about the active ones came nigh to indra at his birth.
text.1: and shared his great heroic might.
text.2: based upon strength and victory and power o indra is thy birth.
text.3: thou mighty one art strong indeed.
text.4: thou art the vṛtraslayer thou indra hast spread the firmament.
text.5: thou hast with might upheld the heavens.
text.6: thou indra bearest in thine arms the lightning that accords with thee.
text.8: thou indra art preeminent over all creatures in thy might.
